import React, { useState } from "react" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useAuth } from "../contexts/AuthContext" import { FiMenu, FiX, FiUser, FiLogOut, FiHome, FiBook, FiCalendar, } from "react-icons/fi" import "./Navbar.css" const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth() const navigate = useNavigate() const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false) const handleLogout = () => { logout() navigate("/") setIsMenuOpen(false) } const toggleMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen) } const closeMenu = () => { setIsMenuOpen(false) } return (
ðŸ¥— HealthyCookbook
Home Recipes {user && ( Meal Planner )}
{user ? (
{user.name}
) : (
Login Sign Up
)}
) } export default Navbar
